---
title: "Knit SQL Demo"
output:
  html_document: default
---

```{r}
library(DBI)
db <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "sql.sqlite")
```

```{sql, connection=db}
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS packages
```

```{sql, connection=db}
CREATE TABLE packages (id INTEGER, name TEXT)
```

```{sql, connection=db}
INSERT INTO packages VALUES (1, 'readr'), (2, 'readxl'), (3, 'haven')
```

```{sql connection=db, output.var="allPackages"}
SELECT * FROM packages
```

```{r}
packageReadR <- "readr"
```

```{sql, connection=db, output.var="readrPackage"}
SELECT * FROM packages WHERE name = ?packageReadR
```
